announcements:

with a br in it.
pithy: Today is Take a Ranger to Lunch Day!
alert_alt: In The Park... No Food • No Water • No Cell Service Enjoy the park safely. Do Not Die Today!
advice:
See the Indigenous People's exhibit at the Visitor Center in Twentynine Palms.  
Make sure you have warm clothing. Weather can change rapidly.  

Put the park on your phone! Get the NPS app to explore the park without cell service.
